body_html:
The code change in this PR looks fine, the main question is agreeing on how the TF integration will look, for which @zheng-xq is the right reviewer.

(Sorry this is taking a while. I think it's important that we get agreement about what we want the end state to look like so we don't make work for ourselves later.)

The code change in this PR looks fine, the main question is agreeing on how the TF integration will look, for which @zheng-xq is the right reviewer.

(Sorry this is taking a while. I think it's important that we get agreement about what we want the end state to look like so we don't make work for ourselves later.)
